name: BAJUZ Stake Pool
description: Bajuzki is a herd of inspiring young creators and developers who are determined to set an example of success using Cardano. We operate with the GOAL - Getting Others to Adopt and Learn Cardano. Our team is trying to make the Cardano blockchain a real-world commodity that can be used every day. Join our BAJUZ stake pool earn rewards and Bajuzki NFTs only available for our delegators.
